title: Castlevania: Lords of Shadow-UE Repack By Rick Deckard NASWARI+Z
description:
INFO:
Year: 2013
Genre: Action, 3D, 3rd Person, Compilation
Version: 1.0.2.8
Developer: MercurySteam Entertainment and Kojima Productions
Publisher: Konami Digital Entertainment
Publication Type: RePack
Language: ENG/RUS
Voice set Language: ENG
Tablet: enclosing (FLT)

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
 Operating system: Windows Vista / 7 / 8
 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2,4 GHz / AMD Athlon X2 2,8 GHz
 Memory: 2 GB
 Hard disk space: 15 GB
 Sound device: compatible with DirectX
 Video Card: 512 MB VRAM (NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GT / ATI Radeon HD 3850)

DESCRIPTION:
A new milestone in the history of vampire hunters c creatures of darkness and a new stage in the history of the famous series Castlevania. When was the end of time, the Earth was at the mercy of the forces of darkness and the mysterious Lords of Shadow. Countries ravaged by wandering souls of the dead who can not find peace, and mysterious creatures have sown death and destruction among the survivors. The player will become a Gabriel - one of the knights of the Brotherhood of Light, an organization of holy warriors to protect humanity from the forces of evil. His wife fell victim to the creatures of darkness, but her soul is laid to rest. Realizing that the danger looming over the world, she took the right decision - to send Gabriel on the path to salvation of mankind.
